location.zh-cn: 山东省济南市历下区经十路15743号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省人民政府主管司法行政工作的部门。
description.en: The department of the People's Government of Shandong Province of the People's Republic of China that is in charge of judicial administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任山东省司法厅厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任山东省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任山东省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任山东省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任山东省司法厅副厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

nodes.id: 中国共产党山东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党山东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国司法部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国司法部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管全国司法行政工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national judicial administration.

nodes.id: 中共山东省司法厅党组

zh-cn: 中共山东省司法厅党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省司法厅内设立的领导核心。
description.en: The leading party core group of the Communist Party of China established within the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 山东省战时高级审判处

zh-cn: 山东省战时高级审判处

description.zh-cn: 山东省司法厅的前身之一，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice, led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省战时高级审判处处长及山东省司法厅厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the Shandong Wartime High Court and the Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 山东省司法厅的前身之一，由山东省战时高级审判处改称而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice, renamed from the Shandong Wartime High Court.

description.zh-cn: 1945年由中国共产党成立的山东省政府，为山东省人民政府的前身之一。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial Government established by the Communist Party of China in 1945, one of the predecessors of the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共山东省政府主席并兼任山东省司法厅首任厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the Shandong Provincial Government of the CPC and concurrently as the first Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 山东省的高级人民法院。
description.en: The High People's Court of Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府在1955年至1968年间的名称。
description.en: The name of the People's Government of Shandong Province from 1955 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 山东省司法厅直属机构，负责管理全省的监狱工作。
description.en: An institution directly under the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice, responsible for managing the province's prisons.

nodes.id: 山东司法警官职业学院

zh-cn: 山东司法警官职业学院

description.zh-cn: 山东省司法厅直属的警察和司法类高等职业院校。
description.en: A police and judicial higher vocational college directly under the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省司法厅厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

relationships.source: 中共山东省司法厅党组
relationships.target: 中国共产党山东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 山东省司法厅的党组接受中共山东省委的领导。
description.en: The Party Leadership Group of the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice is under the leadership of the CPC Shandong Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 山东省司法厅是山东省人民政府的组成部门。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial Department of Justice is a constituent department of the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国司法部

description.zh-cn: 山东省司法厅受中华人民共和国司法部的业务指导。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial Department of Justice receives professional guidance from the Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 山东省战时高级审判处

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的山东省战时高级审判处于1941年3月24日正式成立。
description.en: The Shandong Wartime High Court, led by the Communist Party of China, was formally established on March 24, 1941.

relationships.target: 山东省战时高级审判处

description.zh-cn: 兼任处长。
description.en: Served concurrently as Director.

relationships.source: 山东省战时高级审判处

description.zh-cn: 1943年10月10日，山东省战时高级审判处改称为山东省司法处。
description.en: On October 10, 1943, the Shandong Wartime High Court was renamed the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月13日，中共山东省政府成立，并将山东省司法处更名为山东省司法厅。
description.en: On August 13, 1945, the CPC's Shandong Provincial Government was established and renamed the Shandong Provincial Judicial Office to the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 兼任厅长。
description.en: Served concurrently as Director.

description.zh-cn: 1950年7月，山东省司法厅改为山东省人民法院。
description.en: In July 1950, the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice was changed to the Shandong Provincial People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 1958年起与山东省司法厅合署办公，1959年12月山东省司法厅被撤销后，其司法行政工作由山东省高级人民法院办理。
description.en: Starting in 1958, it shared office space with the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice. After the department was abolished in December 1959, its judicial administrative work was handled by the Shandong Provincial High People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 1959年12月，山东省人民委员会决定撤销山东省司法厅，该决定于1960年1月17日正式生效。
description.en: In December 1959, the Shandong Provincial People's Committee decided to abolish the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice, and the decision officially took effect on January 17, 1960.

relationships.source: 中国共产党山东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 1979年12月23日，中共山东省委决定重新建立山东省司法厅。
description.en: On December 23, 1979, the CPC Shandong Provincial Committee decided to re-establish the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 山东省监狱管理局是山东省司法厅的直属机构。
description.en: Shandong Provincial Prison Administration Bureau is an institution directly under the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.

relationships.source: 山东司法警官职业学院

description.zh-cn: 山东司法警官职业学院是山东省司法厅的直属机构。
description.en: Shandong Vocational College of Judicial Police is an institution directly under the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice.
